con:method.name: v2_5_event_dates
con:method.con:description:
This call returns list of available event dates for which events are avaiable on sale, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.
** *Authorization required ** Fetch list of available event dates

con:parameter.con:name: start_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having start date `greater than or equal to` End date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If start_date exists, end_date is mandatory field. Default value is `todays date`.

con:parameter.con:name: end_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having end date `less than or equal to` Start date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If end_date exists, start_date is mandatory field. Default value is `1 yr from start_date.`

con:parameter.con:name: min_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having price `greater than equal to` min_price for requested purchase flow. If min_price exists, max_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: max_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having price `less than equal to` max_price for requested purchase flow. If max_price exists, min_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: promo_code
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates filtered by applied promo code.

con:parameter.con:name: venue_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates filtered by applied venue id.

con:parameter.con:name: artist_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates filtered by applied artist id.

con:parameter.con:name: sort_by
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates sorted by date ascending[sort_by=date] and descending[sort_by=-date].

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is 20.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is 1.
